mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users_H (user_id, action_type, ip_address, user_agent, login_type, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{actionType}, #{ipAddress}, #{userAgent}, #{loginType}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, action_type, ip_address, user_agent, login_type, created_at FROM users_H WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, user_id, action_type, ip_address, user_agent, login_type, created_at FROM users_H WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND action_type = #{actionType} ORDER BY created_at DESC
